infos.value: Lord Dario...
We must part soon, Vinera...
No! I'm going with you—!
I would give you aught you wanted, but what you are saying now is the one thing I cannot grant you.
Why not...!? Though I love you so!?
Our child grows within you, if I am not mistaken.
How did you—
I just know. At least that much, anyway.
We cannot involve an innocent child in this.
If that child is born into this world—
You wish for me to keep it safe from the terrors of war?
No, that is not it.
Do not impose anything on it.
I hope you shall let our child live as he or she wishes.
Because in this world, nothing is more precious than freedom...
You of all people understand what I mean, right?
...Right.
There is one more thing.
If you have the chance to meet Machérie...
Tell her I said, "Please forgive me"...
Lord Dario?
Lord Dario... Please, don't leave me all alone.
Vinera...! Someone is coming!
Lord Dario... I will raise this child with everything I have to give.
So please...watch over us.
